title: Jupiter Transit in the 4th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Jupiter transits the 4th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus turns toward emotional security, home, family, and inner stability. This phase supports harmony in domestic life, expansion through property, education, or relocation, and a stronger sense of belonging. Guidance from elders brings reassurance, and inner peace improves with maturity. However, overindulgence in comfort or unrealistic expectations from family can create imbalance. With discipline, this transit strengthens roots, emotional wisdom, and long-term domestic growth.

sections.title: Career
points: Support from family for career goals

closing: This Jupiter transit nurtures emotional roots and home life. With balance, it brings stability, inner peace, and lasting domestic growth.
